tags.name: Drafts API
tags.description: The API for saving, updating, finding or deleting draft case data

tags.name: Elastic Based Search API
tags.description: Internal ElasticSearch based case search API, returning extra information required by the UI for display purposes on a UI.

422.description: One of: cannot find event in requested case type or unable to sanitize document for case field

put.description: Update a user's roles for a specific case. Grant access for added case roles and revoke access for removed case roles.

403.description: Grant action is reserved to users with entire jurisdiction access

post.description: Search cases according to the provided ElasticSearch query. Supports searching across multiple case types.

parameters.name: ctid
parameters.description: Comma separated list of case type ID(s) or '*' if the search should be applied on any existing case type. Note that using '*' is an expensive operation and might have low response times so always prefer explicitly listing the case types when known in advance

schema.description: Native ElasticSearch Search API request. Please refer to the ElasticSearch official documentation. For cross case type search, the search results will contain only metadata by default (no case field data). To get case data in the search results, please state the alias fields to be returned in the _source property for e.g. "_source":["alias.customer","alias.postcode"]

200.description: List of case data for the given search request

post.description: Search cases according to the provided ElasticSearch query. Supports searching a single case type and a use case.

parameters.name:
Use case for search. Examples include `WORKBASKET`, `SEARCH` or `orgCases`. Used when the list of fields to return is configured in the CCD definition.
If omitted, all case fields are returned.
jsonSearchRequest
parameters.description:
A wrapped native ElasticSearch Search API request as a JSON string. Please refer to the following for further information:
- [Official ElasticSearch Documentation - Search APIs](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search.html)
- [Official ElasticSearch Documentation - Query DSL](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl.html)
- [CCD ElasticSearch API LLD](https://tools.hmcts.net/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=843514186)

Note that for backward compatibility this API also supports unwrapped native ElasticSearch requests (i.e. requests consisting of a native query instead of being wrapped in a `native_es_query` object).

schema.description:
A wrapped native ElasticSearch Search API request as a JSON string. Please refer to the following for further information:
- [Official ElasticSearch Documentation - Search APIs](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/search.html)
- [Official ElasticSearch Documentation - Query DSL](https://www.elastic.co/guide/en/elasticsearch/reference/current/query-dsl.html)
- [CCD ElasticSearch API LLD](https://tools.hmcts.net/confluence/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=843514186)

Note that for backward compatibility this API also supports unwrapped native ElasticSearch requests (i.e. requests consisting of a native query instead of being wrapped in a `native_es_query` object).

403.description:
Request doesn't include a valid `ServiceAuthorization` header. This applies to all missing, malformed & expired tokens.
A valid S2S token issued to the name of a non-permitted API Client will also return the same.

500.description:
An unexpected situation that is not attributable to the user or API Client; or request is invalid. For some other types HTTP code 400 is returned instead.
Invalid request examples include:
- Malformed JSON request.

401.description: Request doesn't include a valid `Authorization` header. This applies to all missing, malformed & expired tokens.

400.description:
Request is invalid. For some other types HTTP code 500 is returned instead.
Examples include:
- Unsupported use case specified in `usecase` query parameter.
- No case type query parameter `ctid` provided.
- Query is missing required `query` field.
- Query includes blacklisted type.
- Query has failed in ElasticSearch - for example, a sort is attempted on an unknown/unmapped field.
- Query includes supplementary_data which is NOT an array of text values.

404.description: Case type specified in `ctid` query parameter could not be found.

422.description: One of: cannot find event in requested case type or unable to sanitize document for case field

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1) Date of death invalid format
2) Sort by category invalid
3) Sort direction invalid
4) Max return record count must be between 1 and 10000
5) At least one jurisdiction or case type must be provided in the search criteria
6) Jurisdiction ID exceeds maximum length of 70
7) State ID exceeds maximum length of 70
8) Case type ID exceeds maximum length of 70
9) Case reference invalid format
10) Start record number must be 1 or more
11) Date of birth invalid format

details: State ID exceeds maximum length of 70

422.description:
The event could not be processed, for example due to one of the following:
- Data validation failed
- Invalid event (e.g. event ID not provided/known)
- Case does not comply with pre-state condition for event

get.summary: Get Case-Assigned Users and Roles
get.description: **Deprecated**: Use POST /case-users/search instead: were query params have been moved into the request payload, to avoid hitting *414 URI Too Long* issues.

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1. Case ID is not valid, 
2. Case ID list is empty, 
3. User ID is not valid.

403.description: Access to other user's case role assignments not granted

parameters.name: Valid Service-to-Service JWT token for an approved micro-service

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

400.description:
One or more of the following reasons:
1. Case user roles list is empty, 
2. Case ID is not valid: has to be a valid 16-digit Luhn number, 
3. User ID is not valid: has to be a string of length > 0, 
4. Case role name format is invalid: has to be a none-empty string in square brackets, 
5. Organisation ID is not valid: has to be a non-empty string, when present.

403.description:
One of the following reasons:
1. Unauthorised S2S service
2. Client service not authorised to perform operation.

parameters.name: Valid Service-to-Service JWT token for an approved micro-service

401.description: Authentication failure due to invalid / expired tokens (IDAM / S2S).

403.description:

delete.summary: Delete a list of Case Type Schemas

case_data.description: Case data as defined in case type definition. See `docs/api/case-data.md` for data structure.

data_classification.description: Same structure as `case_data` with classification (`PUBLIC`, `PRIVATE`, `RESTRICTED`) as field's value.

total.description: Total number of search results (including results not returned due to pagination)

SearchResultViewHeaderGroup.description: Definition of a case type in the context of the search

fields.description: Definition of the fields for the case type

cases.description: Case references for the case type that are returned in the search

display_context.description: whether this field is optional, mandatory or read only for this event

display_context_parameter.description: contain names of fields for list or table

show_condition.description: Show Condition expression for this field

retain_hidden_value.description: whether this field is data should be retained, dependant on show_condition being populated

publish.description: whether this field is data should be published

publish_as.description: Alias for field id if published is set to true

default_value.description: Default value for the case field, if no existing value

nullify_by_default.description: Nullify By Default value for the case field

title_display.description: Title label to be displayed for state

live_from.description: Date and time from when this version is valid from

live_until.description: Date and time this version is to be retired

data.description: Case data as defined in case type definition. See `docs/api/case-data.md` for data structure.

data_classification.description: Same structure as `data` with classification (`PUBLIC`, `PRIVATE`, `RESTRICTED`) as field's value.
